content:
Multi-Language Support

With Einstein Reply Recommendations, you can show agents common replies in 16 languages during chat and messaging sessions: Arabic, Chinese-simplified, Chinese-traditional, Dutch, English, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Thai, and Turkish.

To build the Einstein Reply Recommendations model: Customize Application

Follow the steps to enable reply recommendations and build your recommendation model. Replies are based on a model that Einstein generates by analyzing your closed chat transcripts. Einstein requires at least 1,000 closed chat transcripts per language to deliver replies in that language.

All languages detected by Einstein are listed in the Languages section of the setup page. The Languages section shows the languages detected, the number of transcripts detected in that language, whether the model is ready to activate, and the model status.

To activate a model, select Disabled/Enabled. Then follow these steps to review and publish your replies.

Activate Your Reply Recommendation Model
title: Enabling Multi-Language Support with Einstein Reply Recommendations
